headline: Verizon Communications (NYSE:VZ) Offers Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold7 And Flip7 On 3-Year Plans
summary: Verizon Communications (NYSE:VZ) recently introduced the Galaxy Z Flip7 and Galaxy Z Fold7 for preorder, offering advanced features at competitive pricing. This product announcement coincided with a flat price move over the last quarter. Broader market influences, like ongoing uncertainty around U.S. trade policy and tariff developments, likely played a more significant role in maintaining equilibrium in the company's share price relative to the market, which also stayed flat. Events like...

headline: Amanda Serrano and Total Wireless Champion the Everyday Fighters Who Don't Fight in Rings
summary: NEW YORK, July 09, 2025--As Amanda Serrano steps back into the ring with Katie Taylor at Madison Square Garden, she knows what it means to be underestimated. The boxer has spent her career proving doubters wrong – moving between seven different weight classes, and elevating women's boxing with Most Valuable Promotions. Now, just as Serrano prepares for what many consider the biggest fight of her career, she recognizes that the same fighting spirit exists in people everywhere – far beyond the box
